summary: Build a modern, premium, professional website for Beemedha (natural honey & bee products) focused on online sales, trust-building, and live product/news updates, with responsive, fast, SEO-friendly structure and an admin panel for managing updates.
architectural_notes: Plan for live product availability/pricing updates and news updates backed by an admin-managed data source (admin panel/CMS).
Checkout should be architected as future-ready (secure e-commerce expansion) even if not launched initially.
SEO-friendly structure and performance (fast loading) are core non-functional requirements.

existing_features.title: Implement a consistent premium, organic Beemedha visual theme across the site: warm honey-gold/deep amber/natural brown/soft cream with green accents, elegant serif headings + clean sans-serif body text, ample white space, nature-inspired styling, and reusable layout primitives (header, section wrappers, cards, badges, buttons).

Create the main site navigation and routing for required pages: Home, About Beemedha, Products (listing), Product Detail, Live Updates/News, Certifications & Quality Assurance, Contact Us, plus Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions.

Build the Home page with: hero section featuring tagline “Pure Honey, Straight from Nature”, high-quality honey/beehive visuals, primary CTAs (“Shop Now”, “Explore Our Honey”), and a trust highlight section for “100% Natural”, “No Adulteration”, “Lab Tested”.
Build the About Beemedha page describing Beemedha’s story and commitment to purity, ethical beekeeping practices, and sustainable harvesting methods, using clear sections and supportive visuals.

Build the Products listing page that displays product cards with image, name, price, and availability status, supports browsing by the specified categories (Raw Forest Honey, Organic Wild Honey, Herbal Infused Honey, Honey Comb), and reflects live updates from the backend.
Build the Product Detail page showing: detailed description, nutritional values, harvest location, benefits, and customer reviews; display current price and availability from the backend.
Build the Live Updates / News page that lists announcements/updates from the backend with clear date display, filtering by update type, and a detail view/expanded reading experience.

Create the Certifications & Quality Assurance page with sections for lab testing details, organic certifications, and quality seals/trust badges, using premium badge visuals and clean content hierarchy.

Build the Contact Us page with: a contact form (name, email/phone, message), a WhatsApp chat button (link-based), displayed email & phone details, and an embedded Google Maps location (iframe embed or map link).
Implement a global Footer containing: social media links, newsletter signup, and links to Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.

Create an Admin panel UI for managing live updates, including CRUD for products (including stock status, price, images, categories) and news items; restrict access to authenticated admins using Internet Identity.

Implement “live updates” behavior on the frontend using React Query (polling and/or refetch-on-focus) so product availability/pricing and news updates refresh without manual page redesign; provide a visible “Last updated” timestamp on relevant pages.

Ensure technical quality: fully responsive layouts (mobile/tablet/desktop), fast-loading pages (optimize images and avoid unnecessary heavy assets), and SEO-optimized structure (semantic headings, per-page titles/meta descriptions, accessible navigation).

Prepare the product purchase flow UI to be “secure checkout ready” for future e-commerce expansion by adding non-functional placeholders (e.g., “Add to Cart” and “Checkout coming soon”) without implementing payments or external integrations.

new_feature_requests.summary: Define Beemedha brand identity in UI (premium organic tone, honey-gold/amber/brown/cream with green accents; serif headings + sans body)
Home page with hero tagline, high-quality visuals, CTAs, and trust highlights (100% Natural/No Adulteration/Lab Tested)
About Beemedha page (brand story, ethical beekeeping, sustainable harvesting)
Products listing page with live updates (price + availability) and categories (Raw Forest/Organic Wild/Herbal Infused/Honey Comb)
Product detail page (description, nutritional values, harvest location, benefits, customer reviews)
Live Updates / News section (new harvest announcements, seasonal availability, price updates, limited-time offers)
Certifications & Quality Assurance page/section (lab testing details, organic certifications, quality seals/badges)
Contact page (contact form, WhatsApp button, email/phone, Google Maps)
Global footer (social links, newsletter signup, Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions)
Technical requirements: fully responsive, fast loading, SEO-optimized structure, and secure checkout-ready architecture for future e-commerce expansion
Admin panel/CMS for managing live product updates (stock, pricing, new arrivals) and news updates

Implement backend data models and APIs to support live product updates: products with category, name, images, description, nutritional values, harvest location, benefits, price, and availability status (In Stock / Limited / Out of Stock), plus timestamps for updates/new arrivals.

Implement backend data models and APIs for a Live Updates/News feed supporting: new harvest announcements, seasonal availability, price updates, and limited-time offers, with publish dates and optional product references.
Implement backend handling for contact form submissions (store submissions with timestamp; provide an admin-only listing view in the admin panel).
